FuncDef: The reset dldp statistics command clears statistics about DLDPDUs on a specific interface. The reset dldp statistics command clears statistics about DLDPDUs on a specific interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about DLDPDUs on a specific interface.
If the interface <interface-type interface-number> parameter is not specified, statistics about DLDPDUs on all DLDP-enabled interfaces are cleared.If the interface <interface-type interface-number> parameter is specified, statistics about DLDPDUs on a specified interface are cleared.
-

ExtraInfo: To collect statistics about DLDPDUs within a specific period, run the reset dldp statistics command to clear the existing statistics about the DLDPDUs on a specific interface.
